text: Moreiradromia antillensis is a species of sponge crab. This species lives in the Western and central Atlantic Ocean.Davie, P. (2014). Moreiradromia antillensis (Stimpson, 1858). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=421894 on 2014-11-01 ==References== Category:Dromiacea Category:Crustaceans described in 1858
title: Moreiradromia antillensis
